actions.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Unanimous Consent.

official_title: A resolution that the House adjourn as a mark of respect to the memory of the Honorable Phillip Burton, a Representative from the State of California.

summary.text: Expresses the condolences of the House on the death of the Honorable Phillip Burton, of California.

titles.title: A resolution that the House adjourn as a mark of respect to the memory of the Honorable Phillip Burton, a Representative from the State of California.
